moreBlocks.articles:
• Bankruptcy
    The attorneys at the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl have more than 25 years of experience representing individual and business debtors in connection with bankruptcy.
  • Chapter 7 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 7 bankruptcy, often called a liquidation or straight bankruptcy, is the most common type of bankruptcy proceeding.
  • Chapter 11
    Contact our Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Maryland Attorney.
  • Chapter 13 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 13 Bankruptcy is a way for people to "reorganize" their debt into a manageable, monthly payment plan that is fair for the individual's creditors.
  • Tax Controversy
    We provide aggressive, experienced legal representation before the Internal Revenue Service and state tax agencies for audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation.

description:
Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, in Westminster, Maryland, provides strong, experienced representation for bankruptcy and tax litigation concerns. Our law firm, through six convenient locations, serves clients in the city of Baltimore, and in Harford County, Carroll County, Baltimore County and Howard County.

Our bankruptcy practice includes both personal bankruptcy, through Chapter 7 liquidation and Chapter 13 debt reorganization, and business bankruptcy, through Chapter 11. We also provide aggressive representation for audits, collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation before the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) and state tax agencies.

Robert Stahl has been an attorney for more than 20 years and a certified public accountant (CPA) for more than 30 years. This experience gives him the knowledge and skill to lead our legal team in the successful resolution of our clients' debt and tax issues.

Our law firm has been helping individual and business debtors with bankruptcy and tax concerns since 1983. We are dedicated to helping clients achieve the best possible outcome -- a future free of overwhelming financial debt and tax concerns.

For a free initial consultation, contact the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, today. We accept all major credit cards. Evening and weekend appointments are available at our law firm upon request.
